item.title: What Ozone
item.description: What is Ozone and how does it work? Ozone provides advertisers, publishers and their programmatic partners with a range of services that enable advertisers to reach engaged audiences at scale in quiality contextual environments; and publishers to monetise their content and audience from advertising Described here is a high-level overview of the programmatic ecosystem and Ozone’s role. Programmatic Advertising - The Helicoptor View At it’s most simple level programmatic advertising involves publishers and advertisers interacting with advertising technology companies (we’ll call them Ad Partners), who operate as a middlemen or brokers in the process of buying and selling advertising inventory.

item.title: Services Summary
item.description: Ozone provides the following advertising services: table, th, td { border: 1px solid #EEE; } Customer Service Description Publishers Bid Request Transmission Server-to-server transmission of bid requests to Ad Partners under a publisher > Ad Partner Agreement Managed Demand Monetisation of Publisher inventory and data through Ozone Audience to Advertisers & Ad Partners Curated Demand Monetisation of Publisher inventory to Ad Partners under an Ozone > Ad Partner Agreement Insights and Analytics Dashboards, Insights reports and log-level data Advertisers and Agencies Ozone Audience Managed Service Managed delivery of audience targeting campaigns Ozone Audience Deals Audience targeting made available through self-serve deals Ozone Audience Buyer Console Coming Soon Planning and Insights Audience Planning API (coming soon), Campaign Dashboards, Insights reports and log-level data Data Room Compliant merging of audience data for custom audience targeting and insights Ad Partners Bid Request Transmission Server-to-server transmission of bid requests to Ad Partners under a publisher > Ad Partner Agreement Curated Supply Monetisation of Publisher inventory to Ad Partners under an Ozone > Ad Partner Agreement
